item.title: Your Dog’s Breakfast rides the Charles Bukowski bus
item.dc:creator: Kim Cooper
item.description:

We’ll take a look at his life as partially told by the Esotouric bus… Continue reading Your Dog’s Breakfast rides the Charles Bukowski bus

The post Your Dog’s Breakfast rides the Charles Bukowski bus appeared first on 1947 Project.
item.content:encoded:
Radio Feature by Ryder Palmere – Your Dog’s Breakfast: Episode 105: “This is Charles Bukowski…”

A brief history of the Angelino man known as the Poet Laureate of Skid Row, who pulled poetry out from beneath itself in the 20th century. We’ll take a look at his life as partially told by the Esotouric bus tour, rolling through the neighborhoods in which he lived and created his greatest works, stopping by a bar or two in which he drank. Have a seat and bring a beer.

The post Your Dog’s Breakfast rides the Charles Bukowski bus appeared first on 1947 Project.

item.title: The Christian Science Monitor rides along on the Chandler tour
item.dc:creator: Kim Cooper
item.description:
The Christian Science Monitor‘s Dan Wood, a big Chandler fan, was kind enough to join us on the inaugural Raymond Chandler’s Los Angeles tour and write a story about his impressions. Won’t you have a look at a little piece he chose to call "A gumshoe’s tour of Los Angeles"? The illustration alone is worth… Continue reading The Christian Science Monitor rides along on the Chandler tour

The post The Christian Science Monitor rides along on the Chandler tour appeared first on 1947 Project.
item.content:encoded:
The Christian Science Monitor‘s Dan Wood, a big Chandler fan, was kind enough to join us on the inaugural Raymond Chandler’s Los Angeles tour and write a story about his impressions. Won’t you have a look at a little piece he chose to call "A gumshoe’s tour of Los Angeles"? The illustration alone is worth the trip.

The post The Christian Science Monitor rides along on the Chandler tour appeared first on 1947 Project.
